title: Vert.x Reference Guide - Listening to a Unix Domain Socket - add warning about permissions
body:
### Describe the bug

Vert.x Reference Guide - Listening to a Unix Domain Socket - add warning about permissions 

https://quarkus.io/guides/vertx-reference#listening-to-a-unix-domain-socket 

If I just copy the config snippet
```properties
quarkus.http.domain-socket=/var/run/io.quarkus.app.socket
quarkus.http.domain-socket-enabled=true
```
 and run the dev mode I receive

```
2022-06-02 12:20:32,366 ERROR [io.qua.dep.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain] (main) Failed to recover after failed start: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to start HTTP server
	at io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.VertxHttpRecorder.startServerAfterFailedStart(VertxHttpRecorder.java:265)
	at io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.devmode.VertxHttpHotReplacementSetup.handleFailedInitialStart(VertxHttpHotReplacementSetup.java:61)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.dev.RuntimeUpdatesProcessor.startupFailed(RuntimeUpdatesProcessor.java:1131)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain.firstStart(IsolatedDevModeMain.java:185)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain.accept(IsolatedDevModeMain.java:485)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain.accept(IsolatedDevModeMain.java:68)
	at io.quarkus.bootstrap.app.CuratedApplication.runInCl(CuratedApplication.java:142)
	at io.quarkus.bootstrap.app.CuratedApplication.runInAugmentClassLoader(CuratedApplication.java:97)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.dev.DevModeMain.start(DevModeMain.java:132)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.dev.DevModeMain.main(DevModeMain.java:62)
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to start HTTP server
	at io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.VertxHttpRecorder.doServerStart(VertxHttpRecorder.java:708)
	at io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.VertxHttpRecorder.startServerAfterFailedStart(VertxHttpRecorder.java:257)
	... 9 more
Caused by: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: io.netty.channel.unix.Errors$NativeIoException: bind(..) failed: Permission denied
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.reportGet(CompletableFuture.java:395)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.get(CompletableFuture.java:1999)
	at io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.VertxHttpRecorder.doServerStart(VertxHttpRecorder.java:674)
	... 10 more
Caused by: io.netty.channel.unix.Errors$NativeIoException: bind(..) failed: Permission denied
```

There should be warning, that user needs to have permission to write into `/var/run/io.quarkus.app.socket` location.
The warning should go into docs for sure, would be good to have some info in error message too.

I ended up going with `quarkus.http.domain-socket=/tmp/io.quarkus.app.socket` for experiments :)
